(11:15) 16-V.Testaverde pass to 36-D.Barnes for 5 yards, TOUCHDOWN. Play action before tossing to Barnes in the right flat; Barnes first career touchdown. With the TD pass, Testaverde has tied an NFL record. Darian Barnes is the 62nd different player to have caught a TD pass from Testaverde. Steve DeBerg also completed TD passes to 62 different receivers.
3-B.Cundiff extra point is GOOD, Center-85-J.Robinson, Holder-7-D.Henson.
